item.description:
September Monthly Meet Up!

The Skellig
240 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 647-0679


Hi Everybody!



It's no secret that Margarita's is my favorite meetup night. The group is always relaxed, jolly and friendly. Some of us order dinner, and some people might split appetizers instead, but we always have a blast. Last night, after we left, the group decided to walk across the street and check out The Skellig instead. The appetizers are more traditional there, the menu is a typical pub-style, and the drinks cost less. It's also closer to the parking lot, just around the corner. So, The Skellig it is! We'll try it once and rate it afterwards. If it's awful, we'll have more to talk about! I hope you'll all join us there!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: September Monthly Meetup
